/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BbFleeingCorpu: Keep the betrayers off my back
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BbDownedCorpus: No, no. I'll pay you anything!
Who sent you, what do they want?
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DDarvoMDefGoal: Here we go. Are you ready? I'm ready. Take that data mass and drop it into the system, I'll be able to hack into the ship remotely once you do. Should be easy, you'll find what I need in no time.
Just so you know. I'm a bit new to this whole guide thing, so it's not going to be like the Lotus. Don't worry everything will be just fine.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DDarvoMDefTerm: I think you're near the terminal. Yes, yes you are. Drop me in and I'll get to work.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DDarvoMDefProg: Did you hear something strange?  No, okay I'll keep going, nearly done.
Just making a few more adjustments. Nothing strange going on down there? Just corpus defences? Nothing...else?
There you are. Thought you could hunt me, well look who I brought. The Tenno.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DDarvoMDefTerm: That's it. hmm... I didn't find what I needed. Go to the next terminal. It should be there. I think.
I'm really sorry about this Tenno but you need to go to the third terminal. I just can't seem find what I'm looking for here.
Here we are. The last one. I'm going to try one more thing to see if I can't lure... I mean find...the target.
You did it, you took care of my problem. That freak's been tailing me for months. That's a load off my back. I'm so relieved.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DDarvoMDefMiss: Well that didn't work out as planned. Looks like I'm gonna need to find some more Tenno.
That's not good for business. That's not good for anyone.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DReconObj010Lo: You are here to find anything that can be used to neutralize the toxin. Take out any Grineer you encounter along the way.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DReconObj020Lo: This is a recon mission. You are looking for key ingredients that can be used to build an antidote to the Grineer toxin. Destroy any resistance you encounter on your mission.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DReconObj030Lo: My research indicates everything we need to neutralize the toxin is located in this forest. Find the key ingredients and wipe out any resistance you see along the way.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DReconObjReinf: My scans indicate the chemical compounds we are looking for are in your vicinity. Use your scanner to locate them.
Your scanner should be able to reveal the chemical compounds we are looking for.
Keep searching. This forests holds the key ingredients we need to neutralize the Grineer toxin.
The vegatation in this forest grows too fast and too big for even the Grineer to cut down. Instead they have opted to poison the land. We must stop them.
Rather than trying to live within the forest, the Grineer have opted to destroy it. You must not let this happen.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DReconExtermCo: I'm detecting no more Grineer in the area. When you are done searching for ingredients, get to extraction.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DReconIngredie: Good. That is one of the chemicals we are looking for. Find as many as you can and then head to the foundry to craft an anti-toxin.
Excellent find. See if you can locate any more samples. When you are done the anti-toxin can be produced in the foundry.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DReconObjSpott: See that? That's how the Grineer plan to inject the toxin into the biosphere. When we have the anti-toxin, that is where it goes.
Those Toxin injectors are how the Grineer plan on delivering their payload. That is what we are here to neutralize.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DSabotageObjec: You brought an anti-toxin. Find the injector and neutralize the poison.
Tenno, I see you have an antidote with you. Find the Grineer's poison and deliver your anti-toxin.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DSabotageObjFo: You have reached the target, administer the anti-toxin.
You found the poison. Place the anti-toxin in the injector.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DSabotageObjRe: Neutralizing the Grineer toxin is the only way to save these forests.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DSabotageDefen: I see you crafted a very potent anti-toxin. It will remain effective for much longer. Be prepared for a lengthy fight.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DSabDefend170L: It's in. Now defend the injector while the anti-toxin works to neutralize the poison.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DSabDefend180L: Ready? Keep the Grineer at bay while the anti-toxin does it's work.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DSabotageObjCo: Good work, the Grineer toxin is loosing strength. Get to extraction. This fight is far from over, craft more potent anti-toxins to have an even bigger impact.
Your payload has been delivered. It's time for extraction.  Craft stronger anti-toxins to have an even bigger impact on the Grineer poison.
That was a strong anti-toxin, the Grineer will not last long at this rate. Get to extraction.
Impressive, your antidote has set back Grineer efforts considerably. Time to go home.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DPropGeneral01: Mastery of Earth is Grineer destiny. Our Queens command it.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DPropGeneral02: The Cicero Toxin will bring Grineer order to the land.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DPropGeneral03: We deserve more than a cold dark asteroid! Earth for the Grineer. Earth for our Queens!
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DPropGeneral04: These trees, these genetically modified Orokin monstrosities must wither and die.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DPropGeneral05: Grineer brothers! It is us or the Orokin weeds and we must choose herb-a-cide!
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DPropGeneral06: The garden of earth is overgrown. Who will help me reap this victory from this land?
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DPropGeneral07: Brothers, don't trust any plant you can't rip apart with your bare hands.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DPropGeneral08: Earth is for settlements, settlements, settlements!
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DPropGeneral09: Grineer order will conquer the land. Grineer order will conquer Earth.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DPropGeneral10: The Cicero Toxin will cleanse the land. Leaving a glorious home for our Queens.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DPropTenno150V: Nothing can stop the Grineer. We ARE progress.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DPropTenno160V: Just like these weeds, the Tenno are nothing more than a mistake grown in the bottom of some dirty Orokin test tube.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DPropTenno170V: Tenno hate Grineer strength. They want to tear down anything they are too weak to build for themselves.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DPropTenno180V: Tenno are worse than the weeds. We kill one and three more show up.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DPropTenno190V: We clear this land in the name of Grineer and our Queens.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DPropTenno210V: Down with Orokin weeds! Down with the Tenno!
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DForestEvent23: Tenno bones will be the foundation of Grineer homes!
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DForestEvent24: Death, death, death. Death to the Tenno.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DForestEvent25: No mercy for Tenno. No mercy for their Lotus.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DForestEvent26: The Lotus is just another weed to be plucked and discarded.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DForestEvent27: Our Queens demand justice for your trespasses, Tenno.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DForestEvent28: The Tenno hate our superiority. We will put them out of their jealous misery.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DProtectToxin3: Stop them. Defend the Cicero Toxin
Protect the Cicero toxin. Stop the Tenno.
Tenno crimes require Grineer sacrifice. Protect the Cicero Toxin at all costs.
The Tenno have come to destroy our way of life. Stop them at all costs.
Brothers. Do not let The Tenno threaten our destiny.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DInjToxin110Va: Prepare the Cicero toxin for injection.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DInjToxin120Va: Brothers. Proceed with the culling. Rot the weeds from the inside.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DInjToxin130Va: Proceed with the injections. Our Queens command punctuality.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DInjToxin140Va: Let there be no more delays. Inject the Cicero toxin. Unlock the future.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DToxinNeutrali: No. No, you will not stop this.
Only a small setback, insignificant against the tide of Grineer will.
Tenno, you are only delaying the inevitable.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BossBipedAmbul: The newest entry into the Corpus AI security arsenal is a deadly biped dubbed Ambulas. We have tracked the prototype to this ship. Locate and eliminate it.
Obliterate the prototype. We need to be certain it does not make it to the manufacturing stage.
Destroying Ambulas will be a blow to Corpus robotics research. Stay the course.
Ambulas possess a devastating kick for those who get too close. Long range attacks are advisable.
Corpus robotics technology is reaching grave proportions. Destroying this archetype is imperative.
Ambulas likes to play with fire. Try not to get burned.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BlastDoorProbl: I've detected a Blast Door guarding the target. Install a bypass on the controls.
There's a Blast Door in the way. Patch me in on the Control Panel and I'll take care of it.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/SystemBypassA: Protect the relay. Running system bypass.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/SystemBypassB: Okay, I'm in. Hold this position while I bypass the system controls.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/CorpusBipedA: Corpus Walkers are heading to your location.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/CorpusBipedE: Heavy robotics signature detected. Lock and load.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LbCorpBipedDet: I'm detecting a large security force heading your way... it's the Gri...no wait, it's the Corpus. Definitely the Corpus.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/CorpusJackalA: Here comes trouble. A Corpus Jackal is in your sector.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/CorpusJackalB: Brace yourselves. A Jackal has been detected in your area.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/CorpusQuadrape: Here comes trouble. A Corpus Quadruped is in your sector.
Brace yourselves. A Corpus Quadruped has been detected in your area.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DronesDetected: Warning. I have detected Drone robotics.
They're deploying Drone robotics. Be careful.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/GrineerMarines: Heads up. A Grineer assault team is headed your way.
I'm detecting a large security force heading your way. It's the Grineer.
Watch yourself, foot soldiers are on the way.
There are Grineer marines all over.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/HeavyGrineerB: Something's wrong, there's a Heavy Unit approaching.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/InfestedIncomi: Multiple bio-signatures detected, we've got Infested incoming.
Multiple targets ahead. Leave no one standing.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusSentientA: I am picking up strange energy fluctuations in the area, remain vigilant.
This is unexpected, our enemy... not operate on these fre...
I'm unable to... Tenno, change of...
Tenno... You are... DANGER.  Something else... Something... powerful.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/EnemiesUnaware: Keep moving. None of the scanners have detected you.
You're still in the clear. No detection from enemy sensors.
Keep going. No body knows you're on this ship.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LbUndetectedDa: Keep going. No body knows you're on this ship.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/EnemiesAwareA: Damn... You're on the sensors now. You've been detected.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/EnemiesAwareB: They spotted you. Get ready for a fight.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/EnemiesAwareC: You've been seen. Ready your weapon.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LbDetectedDarv: Wow, they are not happy about you being here.
Looks like you're on the systems now. So watch out.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ShipIcedUpA: This ship cryogenics core has malfunctioned. Expect colder-than-normal temperatures.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ShipIcedUpB: The temperature readings are freezing. The ice in here will damage your shields.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ShipIcedUpC: I'm detecting ice... lots of it. Be cautious, your shields will take a hit from the cold.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ShipOnFireA: It looks like this ship has taken some hits. Stay away from fire damage.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ShipOnFireB: This vessel is self-destructing! Stay away from heat.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ShipOnFireC: Ammunition storage has become volatile. Rounds are combusting everywhere. Stay away from the fire.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ShipOnLockdown: Ship is entering lock down. We'll need to override the system.
Doors are locked. Time to break in.
We've been locked out. Let's overhaul the security.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LbShipOnLockdo: Did they lock you out? That's cute.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LbSandstormLot: Be aware. Sandstorms in the area are going to cut your visibility signifigantly.
Look out Tenno, their is a sandstorm blowing through. Visibility will be minimal.
The enemy won't be the only thing you have to contend with, a sandstorm just blew in.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LockdownBypass: Breach complete. We're free to proceed.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BossHyenaTrans: Recent innovations in Corpus robotics have lead to a surge in production. Their newest animal-like proxy is an unrelenting hunter. Codenamed "Hyena", this robot must be destroyed.
We have tracked the location of one of these beasts to this vessel. Let the hunt ensue.
Several cells have been lost due to reckless attacks. Do not let the Hyena's size fool you, it is incredibly lethal.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BossJackalTran: In an attempt to exert power and authority, the Corpus recently introduced their most lethal security proxy yet. Determine its location aboard this vessel and destroy it.
Nicknamed "The Jackal," this is the same deadly quad-robot which has become extremely problematic for our cells in the field.
Do not dismiss the The Jackal as just another Corpus proxy. This will be unlike any enemy you have faced yet.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BossNefAnyoTra: Sergeant Nef Anyo oversees operations of the Solar Rails in this district. Intelligence reports indicate that Anyo has been using the rails to acquire recovered cryo-pods containing dormant Warframes. Kill him and save your fellow Tenno.
Anyo is stockpiling the pods and selling them to the highest bidders. His clientele includes rogue scientists and splinter groups with nefarious intentions.
Eliminate Anyo. When the job is finished we will send in a clean-up team to recover the pods.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BossNefAnyoVar: Anyo's self-interests are a threat to our ongoing operations. He must be removed immediately.
Anyo's venture has afforded him the best in Corpus security robotics. Eliminate anything that moves.
Anyo has too much at stake. He will fight to the death.
We cannot allow the Warframes to fall into the wrong hands. Taking Anyo out is imperative.
Security has tightened in this section. You are nearing Anyo's position.
Anyo is aware of your presence. Get the jump on him.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BossCouncillor: Director of the Sol Council, Vay Hek is entrusted with settling diplomatic disputes between various races of the Solar System. He abused this power with the premeditated murder of several political opponents. His appointment is dangerous to our continued efforts.
Hek travels with a formidable security force. Getting close to him will prove difficult.
Intel suggests Hek is planning to add to his list of departed adversaries, including several of our own. Take him out.
Security is getting heavier. Hek must be close.
Killing Hek will bring much needed stability to this sector.
Hek has made many enemies. Eliminating him could gain us favor with the council.
You have Hek insight. Stay alert, and stay alive!
Hek is notoriously unpredictable. Be prepared for anything.
If Hek is allowed to live there could be drastic repercussions for the entire system. Take him down. There is no other option.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BossLieutenant: Lieutenant Lech Kril has been implicated in a Grineer plot to annihilate one of our remote colonies in this sector. The plan is to alter the course of a rogue asteroid which will put the colony directly in the planetoid's path. Locate and eliminate Kril.
Kril is a seasoned war hero with many battles under his belt. His victories are decided by his trusty hammer. One which he wields with brutal consequences.
Kril is highly unpredictable. We suspect he may have other tricks up his sleeve. To survive this battle, you must strike hard and fast.
You are nearing Kril's location. Proceed with caution.
Kril is aware of your presence. Strike first!
Eliminating Kril is the only chance for our exposed colony.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BossTylRegorTr: Grineer researcher Tyl Regor has made alarming strides in the field of gene repair. His work would not only reverse centuries of deterioration due to excessive cloning but also allow for stronger and deadlier genetic moulds. Eliminate Regor and put a stop to his work.
The Corpus have locked the Grineer into financial dependence for grafts and antidotes to slow physical deterioration. We need to ensure that the Corpus continue to control this.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BossTylRegorVa: Regor is aware of your presence. Bring him down quickly.
Regor will fight to the death to see this project through. We cannot let that happen. Silence his work.

The only thing standing between the Grineer and total power is their continuous state of genetic deterioration. It's one of the few natural balances in this conflict. Regor's work would destroy this balance.
Expect Regor to be armed with the best in Grineer weapons and defense capabilities.
Regor's grunts are in full force. He must be close.
Unfortunately Regor's brilliance is overshadowed by his complete lack of ethics. His work is a threat to the entire system. He must be terminated.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BossCaptainVor: Captain Vor has lived under suspicion of possessing Orokin technology that grants him powerful abilities. We cannot allow this. Get to his location and eliminate him.
Further intel suggests that Vor acquired his abilities while working recovery missions for the fleet as a freighter hand.
You are nearing Vor's position. Be prepared for a violent battle.
This ship is crawling with grunts. Getting to Vor will prove difficult.
Vor's reputation precedes him. Taking him down will be a favor to the entire system.
Vor is feared across the system. Do not underestimate him.
We believe Vor has the ability to teleport. You will need to watch your back.
Vor has a tendency to play with his prey. Do not let yourself become distracted by this tactic.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BossKelaDeThay: Kela de Thaym holds a position of influence in the Grineer Court. Eliminating Kela should create a power vacuum  inside the Grineer leadership and weaken Grineer influence in this system.
Kela is a product of the Sisters. She is built for combat. Much of her body has been replaced with combat augmentations. Approach her with caution.
I'm detecting a bio-mechanical signature nearby. Be ready for anything.
Intel suggests Kela is armed with explosive weaponry, her personal modification of the Bombard design. Take any necessary precautions to ensure this mission's success.
Kela keeps an entourage of highly-trained Grineer marines with her. We suspect that they are as much for her entertainment as they are for protection.
All Grineer females undergo mandatory military training. Kela in particular revels in combat. She extended her term for more than a decade before returning to the Court. Do not underestimate her.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BossPhoridTran: One of our spy cells has been lost investigating this abandoned Grineer asteroid base. We need you to locate and eliminate whatever is responsible.
This place is crawling with Infested. Unfortunately, something far more ominous awaits. Make your way deeper into the base.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BossPhoridVari: Your target is an aberration of twisted flesh. Put the thing out of its misery.
Avoid the creature's spine-strike. These razor-sharp quills will rip your Warframe to shreds.
The creature is incredibly agile for a deformed quadruped. Keep moving to avoid being crushed.
Listen for its screams. This will mean you are getting close.
Elude its bone-chilling shrieks if you wish to stay alive.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusBossCorpu: The destruction of the Ambulas biped prototype has halted Corpus production plans for this latest model. We hope it is the only of its kind out there.
The death of Arn Etina means the Corpus mineral pipeline has been severed. Robotics production will be disrupted for weeks.
The Corpus are beginning to raise all defenses. The hyena model is the deadliest yet.
Seeing the Jackal in action is grim. It's clear the Corpus are capable of producing robotics beyond what we imagined.
The death of Sergeant Ned Anyo should weaken the Corpus Research and Development operations for quite sometime.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusBossGrine: The defeat of Grineer Captain Vor opens up other regions for the Tenno.
The death of Counselor Vay Hek will bring all Grineer deployments to a halt.
Eliminating a Grineer General will render the Saturn region helplessly unorganized.

The death of revered War Hero, Lech Kril will undoubtedly send shockwaves throughout Grineer society. The silencing of his hammer will bring security to this system, but we have potentially created a martyr in Kril.
Tyl Regor was no ordinary Grineer. He was the leader in cloning reproduction, known as C.R. The self-proclaimed Father of Future Grineer, his death will weaken the future production of soldiers.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusBossInfes: That Golem was the most complex species of infested we've encountered. Their ability to overtake multiple species is growing.
Infested encounters are beginning to reach nightmare-like proportions. This latest abomination proves that there is no limit to the imagination when dealing with these monsters.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DOroVltKey0001: You've opened an Orokin Vault. It appears unaffected by the Infestation.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DOroVltKey0003: You've unlocked an Orokin Vault. Its... clean.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DOroVltKey0004: You have the Vault artifact, let's go.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DOroVltKey0005: You've got it. Something is different about this artifact...
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DOroVltKey0006: Vault artifact acquired. You'll need to extract before we can verify its function.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DOroVltKey0007: The artifact you are carrying appears to be affecting your Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DOroVltKey0008: Until we get you to extraction, that artifact will continue to affect your Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DOroVltKey0009: Your Warframe is being impaired by the artifact.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DOroVltKey0010: It appears that you've triggered security. The Corrupted are here.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DOroVltKey0011: Looks like some Corrupted stayed behind to guard the artifact, it must be valuable.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DOroVltKey0012: The Corrupted will stop at nothing to prevent  that artifact from escaping. This won't be easy.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial01a: I am the Lotus. I will guide you but we must hurry, Vor is coming for you. I see that the cryo-sleep has taken your memory. It does not matter. You are Tenno, I will prepare you.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial02: I see that the cryo-sleep has taken your memory. It does not matter. You are Tenno, I will prepare you.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial04: A Warframe shows your vital statistics. This shows your health.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial05a: The cryo pod has left you in a weakened state.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial06: Your health does not recharge. Touch this healing sphere before we continue.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial07: Now, I have engaged your shields. Shields absorb damage before health is affected.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial08: Notice how the shields will recharge.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial09: I will show you the Tenno fighting system. It has three forms. The first is your blade. A Tenno's melee weapon is always with them, always at the ready.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial10:
Cut down this target.
Tap <MELEE> to quick strike. 
Hold <MELEE> to charge your attacks.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial11: This display shows the clip size and the total ammo you have.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial12: Find ammo on dead enemies and in the environment.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial13:
Take the ammo and reload your weapon.
Press <RELOAD> to reload.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial14: Excellent, the second form is your primary weapon.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial15:
Destroy these targets.
Press <PRE_ATTACK> to shoot.
Hold <AIM_WEAPON> to aim.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial16: Well done. Do you see the indicator below your weapon and Warframe? This is affinity.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial17: You increase affinity during combat, and in missions to come. Increase your affinity to unlock the power of your arsenal.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial18:
Your third and final form is your secondary weapon. Switch weapons now.
Use <NEXT_INV> to switch weapons.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial19:
Destroy this target with your blade.
Tap <MELEE> to quick strike. 
Hold <MELEE> to charge your attacks.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial20: A Tenno must use these forms in combination to destroy their enemies.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial21: Attack these targets using blade and gun.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial22: Excellent. As you level, you receive points to customize your weapons and unlock Warframe powers. I will unlock a power now to demonstrate its use.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial23: Power consumes energy. Absorb this energy sphere.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial24:
Now, unleash your power on this target.
Use <ACTIVATE_ABILITY_0> to activate the first power.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial25a: He dropped a mod. Quickly pick it up, it will come in handy later.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial26a:
We can't afford to waste any more time. I have unscrambled the portal. Get out of here. As fast as you can, run.
Hold <PRE_RUN> to sprint.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial27: I've engaged your map system. Locate your objective.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial28: Prove you are worthy to join us. Destroy the targets before time runs out.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial29: Excellent, you have attained the rank of Initiate.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial30: You have failed my test. Return here tomorrow, if you wish to try again.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial31: I await your return when you have learned more. Farewell.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial01-03C: I am the Lotus, friend and guide. I see that the cryo-sleep has taken your memory. It does not matter. You are Tenno, I will prepare you.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DTutorial0330L: The bridge is in ruins. Tenno, you are a master of movement, traverse this gap.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DTutorial0340L:
Follow this example. Jump against the wall and hold your jump as you run across.
Use <JUMP> to jump then hold <JUMP> to wallrun
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DTutorial0341L: There is no more time. Work on traversal when you have fully recovered. For now, just run.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DTutorial0350L: Vor, is close. Get out of there now!
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DModInstall010: This is the upgrade interface. Here you will equip upgrades called 'MODS' on items in your Arsenal
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DModInstall020: MODS can be found by killing enemies and completing missions. These are crucial to maximizing your power and expanding your tactics. There are hundreds of MOD types.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DModInstall030: Installing MODs is limited by your item's MOD capacity. Increase an item's MOD capacity by ranking it up. Super-charging it with Orokin technology will double this capacity.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DModInstall040: Each MOD has a set of attributes. The description indicates its benefits. This shows which type of item it is compatible with. This shows the capacity cost to install this MOD.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DModInstall050: This symbol indicates the MODS polarity. An item will have some slots polarized. Matching polarity will make a MOD cheaper to install. A clashing polarity will increase the cost.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DModInstall060: Remember - if you see this indicator flashing - if means your MOD capacity is not high enough to install. Check your polarities, rank up your gear and super-charge to increase your capacity.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DModInstall070: That is all for now. Finding and installing MODs is crucial to realizing your Arsenals potential.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DRaptorIntro01: Lotus: The Raptor is the most recent Corpus heavy weapon. You must destroy it before they can begin full scale production.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DRaptorOutro02: Lotus: It's done. Thanks to you the Raptor won't be entering full production any time soon. Get to extraction.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DIntro00010Lot: Welcome Tenno, are you ready to prove yourself?
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DIntro00020Lot: Have you come here to prove your worth?
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DIntro00030Lot: Welcome to the dojo, you have much to prove.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DIntroGeneric0: Welcome Tenno, you have much to prove.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DChlgArrv00010: A challenger has entered the dojo.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DChlgArrv00020: Another Tenno seeks battle, are you ready?
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DActvDuel00030: It's time to issue your challenge.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DCnclDuel00010: A challenger has left the dojo.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DDuelWin00010L: You are a worthy fighter but you must always stay vigilant.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DDuelWin00020L: Very good Tenno, you have defeated the challenger.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DDuelWin00030L: Excellent - you have defeated your challenger.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DDuelWin00040L: You are a strong fighter, our enemies have much to fear.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DDuelLst00020L: You have lost. Perhaps more training is in order.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DDuelLst00030L: You are in need of practice Tenno.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DPlatformChall: Careful Tenno, the ground beneath you is crumbling. Can you defeat these enemies before you have nowhere left to stand?
Your Warframe's movement abilities are key to this challenge. Defeat all the enemies before the ground completely falls away.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DLaserChalleng: Your foes are not the only dangers you will face in the field. Avoid the lasers and defeat the enemies before the timer runs out.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DRaceChallenge: How well do you shoot under pressure? You must traverse this space before the timer runs out. Shooting the targets will buy you extra time.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DStealthChalle: A full frontal attack is not always the best option. Using your stealth abilities eliminate all enemies without being detected.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DGauntletChall: This will be your hardest test yet. Defeat all incoming enemies.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusDojo1Intr: Tenno, you are but one against the hoard. Your survival depends on speed. Go.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusDojo1Wave: You show promise. Alas, this is just the beginning.
Our enemies are innumerable. There is no time for rest.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusDojo1Succ: You have passed this test. Tenno, you give me hope that honor and balance may one day be returned to our system.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusDojo2Intr: A Tenno must be a master of all their weapons. Prove yourself with you primary weapon.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusDojo2Wave: I believe you can handle more.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusDojo3Intr: Prove your ability with a sidearm. Eliminate all targets.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusDojo4Intr: Show me that you know of the old ways. Eliminate all targets using your melee weapon.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusDojo5Intr: You have proven your skills with weapons, Tenno but what of your endurance? Can you survive this onslaught?
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusDojo6Intr: Tenno are more than just fighters. Prove your intellect by hacking these terminals.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusDojo7Intr: Time to test your marksmanship. Track and shoot all targets.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusDojo8Intr: Your Warframe is a weapon. Prove you have mastered it's power.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusDojo9Intr: Now we will test your agility. Shoot the targets to create your path.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusDojoGener: Most disappointing, Tenno. Only return when you are ready for this challenge.
It appears you need more practice, Tenno. This challenge awaits you when you are ready.
A formidable performance. This test is now complete
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankInitiateA: You have attained the rank of Initiate.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankSilverInit: You have attained the rank of Silver Initiate.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankGoldInitia: You have attained the rank of Gold Initiate.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankNoviceA: You have attained the rank of Novice.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankSilverNovi: You have attained the rank of Silver Novice.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankGoldNovice: You have attained the rank of Gold Novice.

/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankSilverDisc: You have attained the rank of Silver Disciple.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankGoldDiscip: You have attained the rank of Gold Disciple.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankSeekerA: You have attained the rank of Seeker.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankSilverSeek: You have attained the rank of Silver Seeker.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankGoldSeeker: You have attained the rank of Gold Seeker.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankHunterA: You have attained the rank of Hunter.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankSilverHunt: You have attained the rank of Silver Hunter.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankGoldHunter: You have attained the rank of Gold Hunter.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankEagleA: You have attained the rank of Eagle.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankSilverEagl: You have attained the rank of Silver Eagle.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankGoldEagleA: You have attained the rank of Gold Eagle.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankTigerA: You have attained the rank of Tiger.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankSilverTige: You have attained the rank of Silver Tiger.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankGoldTigerA: You have attained the rank of Gold Tiger.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankDragonA: You have attained the rank of Dragon.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankSilverDrag: You have attained the rank of Silver Dragon.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankGoldDragon: You have attained the rank of Gold Dragon.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankSageA: You have attained the rank of Sage.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankSilverSage: You have attained the rank of Silver Sage.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankGoldSageA: You have attained the rank of Gold Sage.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankMasterA: You have attained the rank of Master.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankMiddleMast: You have attained the rank of Middle Master.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankGrandMaste: You have attained the rank of Grand Master.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DGrdMstr00060L: The Tenno have gained great strength thanks to you, Grandmaster
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DGrdMstr00070L: The Lotus is pleased to be in the presence of a Grandmaster
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DGrdMstr00080L: We are in your debt Grandmaster, thank you.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DGrdMstr00090L: With your support Grandmaster, the Tenno will rise again.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DGrdMstr00100L: Now the Tenno are stronger by your hand Grandmaster.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusArtifacts: These cards represent the artifacts of the Orokin War. Each provides unique boosts to you and your teammates during missions.
Each player can choose an artifact from their collection, before the mission begins.
These artifacts give a small Tenno squad an edge against their vast enemies.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusFoundryA: This is the Foundry. Here you will build powerful new items to expand your arsenal.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusFoundryB: To build an item requires a blueprint and its components. While there are blueprints in the market, most are hidden throughout the system.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusFoundryC: Search ships and defeat enemies to obtain components. The components found are influenced by the region of space you are in.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusFoundryD: The Foundry is key to owning the most powerful weapons and artifacts that exist.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusMatchmaki: You control how I connect you with other Tenno agents. You may freely join other agents, restrict it to your contacts or go it alone.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusStarchart: Welcome Tenno. This is the Origin System, and you are its ward.
Our enemies control the ancient Solar Rail Network and with it, travel throughout the regions. Complete missions to regain control of the network.
Completing a region activates its real-time alerts. This is key to attacking high-value targets.
You begin at Mercury's Terminus, your only way into the system. It is time for the Tenno to return.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DSurvIntro0010: A lone Tenno operative is raiding this ship for supplies, you are here to distract the enemy. Trigger the alarms.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DSurvIntro0020: Your job is to distract the enemy while a fellow Tenno operative raids the ship for much needed supplies. Make your presence known.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DSurvIntro0030: Keep the enemy busy while a Tenno operative raids this ship for supplies. Ready? Trigger the alarms.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DSurvSupportCu: Life support has been cut off. They're trying to choke you out. Hold on, I'm sending auxiliary life support.
They've turned off critical life support systems. I suspected they might try this, stand by for support.
They have just shut down all systems. I'm sending life support capsules your way.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DSurvFirstCaps: The first life support capsule has arrived. Activate it.
I've delivered a life support capsule to the area. Activating it will buy you more time.
You're running out of air. Activate the life support capsule to keep fighting.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DSurvInterimCa: Another life support capsule is now available.
I've delivered another life support capsule.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DSurvActivated: That should keep you going for a while.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DSurvDropRemin: Fallen enemies will drop crucial life support, be on the lookout.
Look for personal life support modules dropped by fallen enemies.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DSurvFirstRaid: The raid is off to a successful start.
The operative has just made their first discovery. Keep up the good work.
Our operative is making progress. This will help our cause.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DSurvInterimRa: Look what our Tenno operative just found. They could not do this without you.
We will all share in this bounty. Hold out as long as you can.
The longer you fight, the more successful we will be.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DSurvSixtySeco: Things are getting tight. Sixty seconds of life support remaining.
Be aware you are down to your last sixty seconds of life support.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DSurvThirtySec: You are running out of time.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DSurvExtract01: Extraction is available, if you need it.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DSurvExtract02: When you are ready, go to extraction
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DSurvExtract03: When you need it, extraction is ready.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DSurvExtractUr: Critical life support levels. Extraction is your best option.
You are running out of time. Consider extraction.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MissionObjecti: Your are here to find our target and bring them to the extraction point. Happy hunting.
We received intel that someone vital to enemy operations is aboard this ship. Find them, and capture them.
You are here on a Capture mission. You must find, capture and extract our target.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DCaptureMultiO: We have multiple targets of interest for this mission. Bring them all to me.
Capture all targets on this ship. Bring them to me alive.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/GoalReinforcem: The VIP has vital information that we will need to extract, we need our subject brought back alive.
We cannot let our target know we're here. Track them down quickly.
Our target is aboard this ship somewhere. Find them.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DCaptureMultiR: These are high value targets, their capture is crucial.
Be aware Tenno, these targets are a very high flight risk.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ObjectiveFound: You found the VIP. Don't let them escape.
There's our target. Capture and extract them.
Our subject is here. Capture them and do not let them escape.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DCaptureMultiF: You've found a target. Capture them quickly before they escape.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ObjectiveCompl: Success! The captive is safely in our hands. Congratulations Tenno.
Mission complete, the captive has been escorted to the extraction point. Well done.
Excellent work. We'll interrogate the captive back at base. Your part is done here, Tenno.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DCaptureMultiO: Target captured. On to the next.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MissionFailedC: Mission failed. The target has escaped.
They've got away. We have failed.
You failed Tenno, your captive has escaped. This doesn't bode well for the campaign.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DCaptureMultiO: All targets have escaped. This is most disappointing.
They all got away, this mission is a failure.
We lost that one. Do not let any more get away.
Target escaped. Do not let that happen again.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MissionObjecti: This is a rescue mission. We need to find and liberate the hostage before any harm comes to them.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RescueMissionS: Here are the holding cells. Search each one for the hostage.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MissionObjecti: Aboard this vessel is a prisoner that is vital to our operations. Search the ship for the holding location.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RescueMissionS: The captive will be in one of these cells. Search them.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MissionObjecti: Our intel suggests that our person of interest is aboard this ship. Search all decks for the hostage, and bring them home.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RescueMissionS: We've reached the prison. Find our prisoner in one of these cells.
This is the jail. Our hostage is in one of these cells.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/GoalReinforcem: Find the captive as soon as you can, we don't have much time.
We can't leave the ship without rescuing the prisoner, keep searching.
There's no telling what the captors are doing to our rescue target, you need to find the holding cell immediately.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ObjectiveFound: You've located the hostage. Escort the prisoner to the extraction point and I'll take care of the rest.
Subject found. You need to move the captive off the ship to safety. Protect them at all costs.
Prisoner located. We need to get them back to command in one piece, find your way to the exits and don't leave the subject behind.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ObjectiveCompl: Mission complete. The captive has been liberated, you will be rewarded for this Tenno.
Escort mission complete, the hostage is safe now. Let's get out of here.
The captive has been secured, you've done your part Tenno, we'll take it from here.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MissionObjecti: We need to take full control of this ship. Get to the rally point and defend it against enemy attackers.
We can't afford to lose this vessel, we must reach the rally point and resist all opposing forces.
The artifact we need is on this ship, but it can't be extracted by regular means. We need to take full command of this vessel and defend it against all attackers until an extraction crew can arrive.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/GoalReinforcem: You are almost at the rally point, keep moving.
We can't let the artifact fall into enemy hands, get to it and defend it at all costs.
I'm detecting a high amount of activity at the rally point, you need to get there pronto.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ObjectiveFound: Okay, we're here. Take up defensive positions, we're expecting company.
This appears to be the primary zone of contention. Brace yourself for attack.
Looks like we beat them here, take up a defensive position and be ready for enemy assault teams.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ObjectiveCompl: That's the last of them, objective is secure. Lets go home.
Very impressive Tenno, you held them all back. Time to get out of here.
We're done here. The extraction team will take over from here, time to evacuate.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MissionObjecti: This ship is holding the intelligence files we require, find all four computer access terminals and recover the data units from each of them.
Intelligence files are stored on four separate data units throughout the ship.  We need all the units before we can begin decryption on the data. Get out there and find them.
We need all of the data units being stored on this vessel to compile the intelligence files. Search the ship, find the access terminals, and retrieve each device.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LocateNav: Here's the navigation system. Reroute this ship.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/GoalReinforcem: There must be an access terminal around here, keep searching, we need those data units.
Its critical that we retrieve that intel. You need to find an access terminal first.
We're running out of time, you need to find all the remaining access terminal and get out of there.
Keep going, we need all of the data units before you can leave.
We don't have all of the logs yet, keep searching for the remaining consoles.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ObjectiveFound: Here is one of the access consoles, you need to activate it to recover the data unit.
You found an access terminal, use it to release the data mass from its storage unit.
Activate the access terminal and it should release the data unit. Get the device, and get to extraction.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ObjectiveCompl: Excellent work Tenno, we've got all the data units now. Time to head for the exits.
That was the last data unit we needed. Lets get out of here.
With all four data units collected we can now compile the intelligence files. We're done here, get to extraction.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/InfestedAccess: This looks ominous. Infested or not, we need those data logs. See if you can find any consoles that are still operational.
We need all the data logs from any still-functioning consoles aboard this ship. Shouldn't be a problem for you unless the Infested slow you down.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MissionObjecti: The Assassination target is aboard this vessel.  Seek and destroy.
We need to find the VIP on this ship and take them down. Do not let the target escape.
The VIP we are hunting is here, find him, and take him out.
Assassination contracts are not to be taken lightly. Eliminating this target will have a significant impact on enemy forces. Search the ship, leave no survivors.
We've contracted you with a mark. You are here to find your mark, and eliminate the assigned target.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/GoalReinforcem: Keep searching, the VIP is on board somewhere.
Be sure to search all sectors on this ship, we need to find and eliminate the target.
We can't let the target escape, you need to find them immediately.
This mission won't be easy, the target you are to assassinate has survived these attacks before. Be careful.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ObjectiveFound: Target spotted. Stay sharp, this one is a handful.
There is the assassination target, you know what to do.
You've located the VIP, time to go to work.
Target acquired, take them down.
We've got trouble, the assassination target is here. Wipe them out.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ObjectiveCompl: He won't be bothering us anymore, let's get out of here.
Nice work taking down the VIP, now get to extraction.
Target down, assassination contract complete. Great work Tenno.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MissionA: This is a sabotage mission. Reach engineering and destroy the reactor.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MissionB: Our target is the ship's reactor. Breach engineering and destroy it. Be careful.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/TargetReactorB: We need to destroy the ships reactor.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/TargetReactorC: Disabling the reactor core on this ship will cripple its operating capacity. Find it, and take it out.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/GoalReinforcem: The reactor will have tight security, so look for large patrols of Grineer.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/TargetFoundB: That's the reactor, expose its core and destroy it.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/TargetDestroye: Target destroyed, proceed to the extraction point.
That's it, now get the hell out of here.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/TargetNavigati: Your target is the ship's navigation console. Deliver the payload and override the controls.
Okay, you're looking for the ship's navigation system. It's critical that you deliver the payload to that location.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/GoalReinforcem: That navigation system is around here somewhere, keep searching for it.
You're almost at the target, keep it up.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ObjectiveFound: You've found the target. Deliver the payload and get out of there.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/PayloadDeliver: Payload delivery successfully, time to go.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/GoalReinforcem: Your objective is near, keep pushing forward.
Nice work, you're almost at the objective.
You're closing in on the target, keep your eyes peeled.
You're nearing the target, stay on guard.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ObjectiveFound: There's the artifact, collect what we need and head to extraction.
Artifact found, acquire the Orokin technology and head to the rally point.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/InfestedShipA: I'm detecting infested bio signatures all over the place. You know what to do.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/InfestedShipB: The infestation has corrupted all life here, let's clear it out.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/InfestedShipC: We have got an infestation. Extermination is the only option.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/KillAllObjecti: There is a large platoon of Grineer Marines stationed here. Leave no one standing.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/InfestedExterm: We need to clean this vessel up, search for the source of the infestation and exterminate it.
This vessel is crawling with infested. If its not a Tenno, eradicate it.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/GoalReinforcem: I'm still detecting a lot of infestation activity, let's clean it up.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/KilledEverythi: Other than you, I can't detect a single life form. Let's get out of here.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MobileDefenseO: This is a mobile defense mission. You must deliver payloads and defend a number of locations while I break into the Grineer network. Be prepared for heavy resistance. I can't do this without you.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MobileDefenseG: This will only get more difficult. Get to another terminal and prepare for enemy resistance.
We have got to find another terminal. Proceed and prepare!
I need access to another terminal, find one and patch me in!
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MobileDefenseD: Location reached: Drop me in and defend our position!
Terminal Spotted: Upload me in and prepare to defend!
Here is a terminal: Get me in, and get ready to defend!
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MobileDefenseH: I'm in, Tenno. This will take a moment.
Taking longer than I calculated, continue to defend!
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MobileDefenseO: All Terminals have been successfully hacked. Excellent resistance, Tenno. Let's make our exit!
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MobileDefenseC: The odds were against us, Tenno - but we did it. Mission complete.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MobileDefenseB: All data logs indicate that there is an Orokin Artifact somewhere here, get to it now, defend it, and then we can leave!
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MobileDefenseN: Artifact found. Defend it until the Extraction Team arrives.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MissionComplet: Great work. I am pleased with your performance.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/NavCompleted: Upload completed. Nice work. Get to extraction.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DHarvestTaunt1: Tenno? Can you hear me? You've been a naughty little betrayer, haven't you? Did you really think your support for the Grineer would go unnoticed?
That is sort of behavior I just can't let go uncorrected. Otherwise you'll never learn.
This is really for your own good. Help me, help you... help me.
Good job Zanuka. This Tenno's bones will make you a fine sibling.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DHarvestTaunt2: Zanuka? NO! What have you monsters done to that beautiful creature? I won't forget this.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DJailAwake010L: Tenno. Tenno can you hear me? You've been captured by Alad V's harvester. This is your chance, escape.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DJailAwake020L: Tenno. Ready yourself. You have been captured by the Corpus. It is time to escape.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DJailAwake050A: Leaving so soon? We were just getting started.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DJailAwake060A: Oh Tenno. I unstand you're nervous. But if you come back to us I can assure you; you won't feel a thing.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DJailAwake070A: Don't listen to that Lotus. She just wants to hold you back. Stay with me explore your...potential.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DJailAwake080A: Tenno, there's an entire Grineer battalion here to rescue you. They must really appreaciate your support. Wait, no. I'm mistaken. Your alone with no weapons. Sillly me.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DJailAwake090A: The Grineer are a threat to all. You need to understand the error of you ways. Consider my efforts a favor.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DJailObj030Lot: I have extraction ready but you have to find your weapons first. Can you handle that?
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DJailObj040Lot: You're not going to last long without your weapons, they are scattered around this facility. Find them.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DJailFoundPrim: You found your primary weapon. Lock and load.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DJailObjComp14: You found all your weapons. Get out of there.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DJailObjComp15: You're done. Extraction is waiting. Go.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DCorpExtMissio: You have chosen to support the Grineer in this fight. Eliminate all Corpus.
You are fighting alongside the Grineer on this mission. Destroy all Corpus.
Make sure the Grineer win this battle, leave no Corpus functioning.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DCorpExtGoalRe: Rraahudd Tenno! Now we fight together! Now we crush the greedy milk from their skulls. The Corpus will pay for their crimes with their useless lives.
You shoot well. You cut well. You serve me well, Tenno.
Tenno, of course you side with us. Of course the Grineer are your best option. We share your joy in Corpus death.
What's that test tube dog giving you to fight for him? Whatever it is I'll double it!
So, the betrayers are fighting for the dogs now? Why am I not surprised. The sooner my Zanuka project is completed the better. The system must be ridden of your hypocrisy.
Do you really think you are saving your comrades by supporting the dogs. What do you think happens if you allow Sargas to win? Do you think they'll be safe when you're all his slaves?
Why Tenno what an intriguing Warframe you have. I look forward to adding it to my inventory.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DCorpExtObjCom: The Corpus have been eliminated. Time to head home.
That's it, I am detecting no functioning Corpus. Get to extraction.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DGrinExtMissio: The situation forces you to help The Corpus in this mission. Kill all Grineer.
Your sense of duty compels you to help The Corpus today. Destroy all Grineer forces to help maintain the balance.
You are fighting with The Corpus in this battle. No Grineer can be left alive.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DGrinExtGoalRe: So we agree. The Grineer are too powerful, too arrogant. They must be put in their place. I'm glad you won't let our differences get in the way of our common interests.
Tenno, you know, we may not always see eye to eye... well, you don't have eyes but I'm pleased we've found common ground in our fight with these Grineer dogs.
You've made a smart choice Tenno. When the Dogs fall there will be profit for all of us.
Tenno, this was the only rational choice. And please don't worry about your friends, I have grand plans for them.
You and I aren't so different Tenno. We both know those dogs need to be put down. I sense we are at the beginning of a beautiful new partnership.
Nobody wants to be a slave. You understand that. These dogs aren't our masters, we won't follow their orders any longer.
Rraahudd Tenno! So willing to sacrifice your own. So willing to help these greedy worms. So willing to die for worthless cause.
Tenno, Alad will betray you. Alad will defile your kind. Alad will bleed from his selfish eyes as I crush him with your metal corpse.
Attention Tenno: Is it too late to change sides? Too late to reject the Corpus lies? Too late to save your kind?
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DGrinExtObjCom: That was the last Grineer. Get out of there.
All the Grineer are dead. Proceed to extraction.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DInfExtMission: Nobody deserves the infestation. Clear it from this node.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DInfExtGoalRei: We must destroy this infestation before the monsters become entrenched.
Containment has become impossible, we must destroy this infestation node by node.
The infestation is a threat to all life, we have to wipe it out, even if it means working with the other factions.
Being turned by the infested is a fate worse than death. Even our enemies don't deserve this.
The infestation cannot be allowed to spread.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DInfExtObjComp: I'm detecting no traces of the disease. Get out of there.
We're done. Let's get out of there.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DGenExtObjRein: Picking sides is never easy. You are doing what you feel is right.
Supporting the enemy feels wrong, but keeping the balance requires tough choices.
This aggression has upset the balance of power. We must set things right.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DMissionObj010: It is doubtful that we can trust any Corpus but helping Frohd Bek is the only way we can get to Alad V. Remove the infestation from this ship.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DMissionObj020: This infestation stands between us and Alad V. Clear this ship.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DMissionObj030: I don't trust Frohd Bek but I trust his hatred for Alad V. We'll help him now, if it means we can stop the Zanuka project.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DObjComplete12: One more Infested ship cleared. Get out of there.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DObjComplete13: I'm not detecting any more Infested. We're making progress. Get to extraction.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DGoalReinforce: Oh Alad, all your lying and sneaking and cheating, and what do you have to show for it? You're in dept to the board and I've come to collect.
Look at you Alad, hiding in a corner, playing with your toys. How embarrassing. The Corpus deserves better and I'm the one to deliver the goods.
What happened to you Alad? I looked up to you. Your profits. Your products. A little madness and you throw it all to the Void.
You can't hide, ride or bribe your way out of this Alad. You've been downsized and your fat head is about to suffer cutbacks. Literal cutbacks.
Who got you fired? Who got Zanuka's funding pulled? Oh I know this! I know this! It was me.
I'm feeling a promotion coming my way! About to climb another rung on this ladder! About to send my old pal Alad V into early retirement.
Hey Alad. Zanuka is done! You are done! When you're dead the Board will be signing over everything you own to me!
The Tenno are too dangerous, too profitable, to provoke! Zanuka was a bad paradigm. A costly miscalculation but don't worry Alad, I'll keep your credits warm when you're gone.
It's time for your to pay your debts! I've got the Betrayers doing the repro work - if you ask me they've got a different idea of blood money.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DMissionObj000: These Corpus scouts think they are safely hiding in the void, that is a false assumption. Bring them to me.
You are looking for a Corpus scouts, they have crucial information about the location of those Grineer settlements.
Somewhere in this void ship are Corpus scouts, they have crucial information about the location of the Grineer settlements.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DDualBoss001Lo: This is your most dangerous assassination yet - Captain Vor has teamed up with Lech Kril to take you down. Let's show them your true Tenno power.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DDualBoss002Lo: Vor and Kril are waiting for you. I recommend you focus your attacks on one target, if you split your attention you may fail.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DDualBoss003Lo: Vor's mobility could make him the larger threat. Observe their attack patterns and look for an opportunity to divide and conquer.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DGoalReinforce: We cannot allow the scouts to escape.
Keep moving, the sooner we find the scouts, the sooner we can decode the location of those settlements.
We must not let the targets slip through our fingers. Find the scouts.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DObjFound00010: You found a scout. Execute the capture protocols.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DObjFound00020: Good job finding a target. Make sure he doesn't get away.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DObjFound00030: Our subject is here. Capture the scout.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DObjComplete00: You captured a scout but your job isn't done yet. There are still more.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DAllObjComplet: That's the last scout.  Head to extraction.
I am not detecting any more scouts. Get to extraction.
We are one step closer to finding those settlements. Time to head home.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DSubObjFailed0: That scout got away but there are still more. Keep moving.
We lost him. Find the others.
Target lost. Locate one of the others.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DObjFailed0001: Mission failed. All the scouts escaped
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DObjFailed0002: You let all the scouts escape.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DObjFailed0003: The scouts escaped! We are no closer to finding those settlements. This is most disappointing Tenno.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DSurvIntroPlan: Keep the enemy distracted while our operative conducts a supply raid. Trigger the alarms when you are ready to start.
You are supporting a lone Tenno operative today. Distract the enemy. Trigger the alarms.
On the other side of this facility a lone Tenno is conducting a supply raid. Keep the enemy distracted. Let them know you are here.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusSabotageS: This generator core on this outpost must be destroyed.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusSabotageM: Keep moving. The power source is deep within the outpost.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusSabotageE: The power core has been destroyed.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusIntelStar: Find all the data units on this outpost. Valuable intel lies within.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusIntelEndA: All data units located. Let's get out of here.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusExtermina: Sensors show this outpost is crawling with Infested. Exterminate the threat.
I'm still picking up signs of the Infested. Keep hunting.
The outpost is clean. Proceed to extraction.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DExtermCorpSta: There are Corpus everywhere. You need to take them out.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DExtermCorpMid: We cannot allow the Corpus to control this outpost. Keep fighting.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DExtermCorpEnd: All Corpus threats have been eliminated. Time to come home.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DExtermGrinSta: We need to send a message to the Grineer. Eliminate everyone on this base.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DExtermGrinMid: The Grineer presence is still strong. There is more work to be done.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DExtermGrinEnd: You are done. It is time for extraction.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusAssassina: Your target is deep within this outpost. Find and eliminate him.
Target eliminated. Get out of here.
You've found the target. Destroy him.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusDefenseGa: Our position has been compromised. Defend the cargo until reinforcements arrive.
The enemy are at our doorstep. You must defend our equipment until reinforcements arrive.
Their reinforcements are endless! Are you ready for more?
Incoming targets. You know what to do.
Reinforcements are inbound. Hold the line.
We are readying reinforcements. Keep fighting Tenno.
Reinforcements available, do you choose to leave now or continue fighting?
Extraction is ready. Unless you can handle more of the enemy.
Rest now, others will continue the battle.
Go now Tenno. You have done well.
Continue to defend! You will be rewarded for your bravery.
Keep fighting. Another opportunity attraction will appear soon.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/SabotageMining: The Grineer have been harvesting a nearby planetoid for weapons-grade material. Locate and destroy their mining equipment.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DFmrn00010Lotu: Destroying a single reactor will not be enough to take down a Fomorian. We will need to poison the well... coordinated teams will corrupt it's fuel supply. This will require gear harvested from Infestation tissues. I will route you to an injector point...
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DFmrn00020Lotu: These Fomorians are massive, keep searching. You will need to locate a fuel cell and inject the corrupting agent. I hope you have a corruptor with you.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DFmrn00030Lotu: Remember, if you are coordinating with other Tenno the Alpha/Beta mixtures are more potent, but a single Tenno cannot equip them at once.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DFmrn00040Lotu: There it is! You should be able to inject the corruptor you brought using the attached console.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DFmrn00050Lotu: Excellent, the corruption process has begun. You must defend this position to ensure the Grineer do not destroy this fuel cell before it spreads through the ship.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DFmrn00060Lotu: Corruption process is complete. Good work Tenno. Get to extraction where I will record your contribution to the operation!
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/SabotageMining: The mining equipment is nearby. It must be destroyed to prevent the Grineer from developing energy weapons.
This research could have unimaginable repercussions. Be on your guard.
Mission success hinges on the destruction of the mining equipment. Expect heavy resistance.
Excellent work. You have managed to thwart potentially dangerous discoveries from being fully realized??? for now.
The Grineer are preparing to magnetically mine asteroids for rare alloys to be used in body augmentations and modifications. Paralyze their research by destroying the mining equipment.
A heavily armed security force stands between you and the mining equipment. Stay alert.
Crippling their equipment will effectively cripple their research.
We need you back alive. Stay alert.
You are gaining the upper hand. Push forward.
They are aware of your presence. Make haste.
Well done. You have brought the Grineer research to a sudden halt.
A dormant comet is being targeted by the Grineer for its volatile materials. The material will be used in the manufacturing of fuel propellant for their fleet. Locate and cripple their equipment.
Destroy the mining equipment before the Grineer can intercept the comet.
It is time to bring the Grineer fleet to a standstill. Strike them where it hurts.
Halting fuel production will give us a much needed advantage. Determine the position of the equipment.
Hostiles inbound. Strike hard and fast.
Impressive. This will temporarily immobilize the Grineer fleet. We will move-in and claim the comet.
The Grineer have set their sights on a large asteroid thought to contain an abundance of Rubedo. Locate and destroy the extraction equipment.
Rubedo must be protected at any cost. Sabotage the nearby mining equipment.
It is imperative we do not let the Grineer get their hands on the Rubedo.
You are approaching a piece of equipment. Watch your back.
Good work. Your efforts have prevented Grineer access to the Rubedo. We have an extraction team en route to appropriate the planetoid's contents.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DualMissionObj: We've received a message that we are to eliminate this ship's captain. Assassinate the target aboard this ship.
Well, this just got interesting. We now need to capture the target aboard this ship.
It seems we'll be here a little longer. Deposit a data unit into the ship's navigation.
We've received a second objective. Defend the artifact on this ship before it's destroyed.
Change of plans, ignore your original objective. Leave nothing alive on this ship. Exterminate all life.
It appears there's some valuable intel stored about this ship. Gather the intel now.
I can't breach this door's security. We'll have to find a key pass. Scanning the ship now... Key signal detected. Marking on your HUD.
We're locked out, patching us in now. I can't bypass this door. Scanning ship now for key pass... and, found it. Marking location on your HUD.
Our mission just got more complicated. There's a hostage on this ship. Rescue them now.
Well, what do you know. I'm detecting an Orokin Artifact aboard this vessel. Extract it before we leave.
It appears we now need to take this ship out from the inside. This ship cannot be left operational. Destroy its Reactor Core.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DVoidIntro0001: Orokin towers have the power to assume physical control of intruders. Your Warframe should protect you from the tower, of course you will still be vulnerable to those under it's control.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DVoidIntro0002: This Orokin tower has been hidden within The Void for over two hundred years. Be careful, we have no idea what or who we might find.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DVoidIntro0003: You have entered the The Void. Use caution Tenno, Orokin Towers have a special way of dealing with unwanted visitors.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DVoidIntro0004: Congratulations Tenno, you are now inside The Void. This tower may be centuries old but it's Neural Sentry is still operational, stay alert.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DVoidIntro0005: Careful, Orokin towers are often guarded by a Neural Sentry, a dangerous entity capable of corrupting intruders and assuming control of their bodies.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DExtermObj0001: You aren't the first ones here. I'm detecting multiple enemy signatures and they're all under the control of the tower. Eliminate the threat.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DExtermObj0002: The tower's Neural Sentry is operational. I'm picking up multiple threats all under Orokin control. Wipe them all out.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DExtermObj0003: You are not alone. This tower is full of life forms, all corrupted by the Neural Sentry. Clean them out.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DExtermGoalRei: Keep fighting. As long as the enemy is here, this tower is useless to us.
The tower's Neural Sentry has turned these soldiers into mindless attack drones. You need to take them out.
The Grineer should have known better than to walk into an Orokin Tower unprepared. Let's clean up their mess.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DExtermObjComp: This tower is clean, we can take it from here. Get to extraction.
That was the final enemy. The tower has nothing left to defend itself with. Proceed to extraction.
You've eliminated all Orokin controlled enemies. Time to go home.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DRaidObj00010L: This tower holds powerful knowledge from the Orokin age. I need you to locate the artifact stored here.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DRaidObj00020L: Somewhere in this tower is Orokin technology so valuable, they hid it in The Void. I need you to find that technology.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DRaidGoalReinf: These Grineer were likely looking for the same thing we are. Unfortunately, they came ill-prepared for the tower's defense network.
You are nearing the artifact. Expect heavy resistance.
The tower has corrupted every intruder that came before you. Keep fighting, the artifact is near.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DRaidObjFound0: There it is. Obtain the artifact.
Artifact found, acquire the Orokin technology and head to the rally point.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DRaidObjComple: We have what we came for, get to extraction.
Artifact acquired. Make your way to the extraction point.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DJ3Golem00010L: We have traced every infestation attack in the Jupiter sector back to this location. You are here to stop those attacks at their source.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DJ3Golem00020L: A creature classified as the J3-Golem has made this base its den. Find the Golem and destroy it.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DJ3Golem00030L: The creature has mutated beyond the strength of a typical infested. Do not let your guard down.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BossGolemTranm: It was difficult to locate the source vector of this sector's infestation but you are finally here.
Deep within this  millennia old Orokin-turned-Infested ship lurks a creature created to fight in the Old War. Make your way to its location and dispatch this monster.
Be wary. The creature has grown unfathomably strong through centuries of absorbing matter and self-replication.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DLotusTrans000: Alad V's newest prototype is a monstrosity forged from the bodies of our fallen Tenno, we cannot allow Zanuka to go into full production. Destroy Alad V and his horrid 'pet'.
Too many Tenno have perished to make Alad V's abomination. There will be no stopping the Corpus if Zanuka is mass produced. You are here to make sure that doesn't happen.
The Zanuka prototype has made Alad V a very dangerous man. If he is allowed to carry out his plans, no Tenno in this system will be safe.
Be careful Tenno, Zanuka has all the power a Warframe with a full complement of mods. It's as if you are fighting one of your own today.
Alad V sees the power of the Tenno and thinks he can take it for himself. That power is sacred, this blasphemy must end now.
If Alad V is victorious today he will dissect your Warframe and use the pieces to build more of his 'pets'. You must not let this happen.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BbAttackGrinee: Try and get behind it, we'll flank it out.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BbPatrolGrinee: I'm bored out of my mind.
Hey, leave my mother out of this.
Just once I wish it would get exciting around here.

Captain Vor: That will not happen again.
Captain Vor: I offered you glory and you choose this?!?
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BbTauntVor0010: Captain Vor: Your DNA will only bring strength to the Grineer.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BbTauntVor0020: Captain Vor: The secrets of your corpse will serve us well.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BbTauntVor0030: Captain Vor: You will join us one way or the another.

/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BbTauntNefAnyo: Nef Anyo: A gathering of the freaks.
Nef Anyo: Fashion victims about to become murder victims.
Nef Anyo: I'm about to fill that suit with blood.
Nef Anyo: You are already wearing your body bag. How convenient.
Nef Anyo: Is that suit a giant diaper?
Nef Anyo: Orokin secrets can't remain safe forever.
Nef Anyo: From pods you come, in caskets you will go.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DApproachSuppo: I never expected your loyalty, you've always been a betrayer to me.
NOW you come to save your friends? After fighting for me. After taking my rewards.  Where are your business ethics Tenno?
When I am the market leader you fight for me but you turn when the competition gets tough. What fickle things you Tenno are.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DCinematic290A: Now, let me show you the future... Zanuka Kill
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DTauntSupporte: We worked so well together Tenno. Now you want to go and throw all that profit away. That makes me sad.
Tenno, you could be so much greater than the sum of all the different parts I will tear you into.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DApproachNeutr: You have a loyalty issue Tenno. My Zanuka project will fix that for you.
I've been looking all over for you Tenno. Come, let me show you my new venture. I think you'd be a perfect fit.
Have you come to make a donation to my newest enterprise? Excellent. Please report to my lab for reconstruction.
If it's your friends you are looking for, you're welcome to place a bid for my newest Zanuka prototype.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DTauntNeutral1: I can't decide Tenno, have you come to save your friends? Or just steal my property?
Tenno, Project Zanuka is the next step in your evolution. I will make you a hundred times stronger. Why resist this?
Market forces dictate that you need to evolve or die. Which will it be Tenno?
Tenno be careful. You must make sure not to damage all those parts of yours. Such valuable merchandise.
Play nice Tenno, Zanuka is one of you. Actually, come to think of it, Zanuka is many of you.
Zanuka is your future. Your destiny. You are obsolete, make way for the next generation.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DLowHeath180Al: Ungrateful. You'll never know what I could have done for you.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DLowHeath190Al: Do you think this is over?
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DLowHeath200Al: You build nothing. All you do is destroy.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DApproachSuppo: You have entered my domain. Uninvited and unprepared for my judgement. I will make you humble.
Your future was bright Tenno. And now you throw that way. Gghutty.
Treason gets quick punishment in my court. Have you come to recieve justice?
Kneel before your master. Pray to me like I a God. That is the only reason you should be here.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DTauntSupporte: Treason? After you pledge yourself to me. Is you honor so hollow?
This betrayal, I was expecting. Tenno have no loyalty to their masters. Ratrigs.
You are useless. A ricochet. Your treachery is impotent.
Your hollow corpse will be paraded around the empire. A warning to future rats.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DApproachNeutr: What flesh is within that |PLAYER_WARFRAME|? I will crush it. I will fill my lungs with your death.
Forget The Lotus. Grineer are your masters. Submit for mercy.
Too easy. I expected more. I deserve a challenge.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DTauntNeutral1: Are you just mercenaries? Fighting for scraps? Where is this so-called Tenno honor?
You think you are guardians? Grineer rule supreme. Grineer protect all.
You Tenno. You fight for treasure. You are just another Corpus machine to me.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DLowHeath270Sa: You fight well. Your death will be glorious.

/Lotus/Language/Webpage/WP_HelpShapeFutu: HELP SHAPE THE FUTURE OF WARFRAME
/Lotus/Language/Webpage/WP_NoAccount: Don't have an account? Sign Up!
/Lotus/Language/Webpage/WP_WarframesDesc: Warframe exo-armor uses unique combative technology to create the ultimate weaponry. The Warframes hold many mysterious powers and mastering one requires dedicated use.
/Lotus/Language/Webpage/WP_TrinityDesc: Trinity is great for players who prefer a supportive role. Warframes with healing technologies are rare making Trinity a great equalizer when the odds are stacked against the Tenno.
/Lotus/Language/Webpage/WP_VoltDesc: Volt can create and harness electrical elements. This is a high-damage Warframe perfect for players who want a potent alternative to gun-play.
/Lotus/Language/Webpage/WP_AshDesc: Ash is great for players looking for a stealthier approach to combat. Lethal abilities are complemented by powers of distraction.
/Lotus/Language/Webpage/WP_NyxDesc: Mind control and psychic attacks make Nyx a very dangerous foe. Her ability to reach into enemy consciousness and manipulate their behavior can turn the tide of any battle.
/Lotus/Language/Webpage/WP_EmberDesc: Ember is a nightmare for light-armored targets. Ember can super-heat the air which opens up surprising crowd-control possibilities.
/Lotus/Language/Webpage/WP_FrostDesc: By channeling moisture and vapor in the surrounding environment, Frost creates formidable defenses and lethal attacks from sub zero conditions.
/Lotus/Language/Webpage/WP_ExcaliburDesc: The perfect training Warframe: the Excalibur suit allows players to explore the power of Warframes with a balanced set of capabilities.
/Lotus/Language/Webpage/WP_MagDesc: With full command of surrounding magnetic energy, Mag is an expert at enemy manipulation. She is a perfect choice for players that want to deal heavy damage in unconventional ways.
/Lotus/Language/Webpage/WP_RhinoDesc: Rhino is the heaviest of all the Warframes. His strength enables him to combine a mix of devastating offensive attacks with formidable defensive powers.??
/Lotus/Language/Webpage/WP_LokiDesc: Desired by advanced players, Loki offers a variety of reconfiguring abilities. The abnormality of Loki's powers allows players to manipulate the battlefield.??
/Lotus/Language/Webpage/WP_FoundersPackD: Being a Founder has its privileges. Snag exclusive itmes that will never be available again, PLUS instant access to the Closed Beta!
/Lotus/Language/Webpage/WP_FoundersPackA: ALL FOUNDERS PACKAGES INCLUDE IMMEDIATE CLOSED BETA ACCESS
/Lotus/Language/Webpage/WP_UpgradeDesc: Upgrade your Founders Package and only pay the difference from your original purchase.
